T02D2256:187b-34: ma rtog pa de ci sa lan zhe na /
T02D2256:187b-35: de'i phyir so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas dngos po med pa ma yin no //
T02D2256:187b-37: de'i rang bzhin brjod du med pa'i phyir 'chi ba mtha'i bde ba zhes bstan te /
T02D2256:187b-39: gang la brten te 'chi ba dang //
T02D2256:187b-41: de la brten nas mchog gi ni //
T02D2256:187b-42: bde ba chen po mchog grub po //
T02D2256:187b-44: bde ba gang gis 'ching bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis skyes nas gnas shing 'ching ste /
T02D2256:188a-1: phal pa'i bde ba la chags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2256:188a-2: de nyid kyang yang dag pa'i bla ma'i brgyud pas
T02D2256:188a-3: blangs nas mchog gi bde ba chen po zhes bya
T02D2256:188a-4: ba'i don to // skad gsang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2256:188a-5: de so sor bshad pa ni /
T02D2256:188a-6: bsam gtan dag dang bral bas na //
T02D2256:188a-7: bsam gtan gyis ni ci zhig bya //
T02D2256:188a-8: rnal 'byor lung gang brjod du med //
T02D2256:188a-9: de la ji ltar bshad du yod //
T02D2256:188a-11: 'dir dang por re zhig sems ni brjod bya dang rjod byed kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
T02D2256:188a-13: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te //
T02D2256:188a-14: de ni rtog pas byas pa ma yin te //
T02D2256:188a-15: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang bral ba'i phyir //
T02D2256:188a-16: 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa med do //
T02D2256:188a-17: de'i phyir gang brjod du med pa de la ji ltar bshad du yod ces pa'o //
T02D2256:188a-19: 'di ni re zhig brdzun kun te ;
T02D2256:188a-20: / ji srid ji srid rtog gyur pa //
T02D2256:188a-21: ji ltar gyur pa de de bden //
T02D2256:188a-22: de nyid gang du mi rtog pa'o //
T02D2256:188a-24: 'di yi rang bzhin dang ba ste //
T02D2256:188a-25: rnam pa med cing rdul bral ba //
T02D2256:188a-26: sangs rgyas ma gtogs gzhan gyis ni //
T02D2256:188a-27: de ni rtogs par mi nus so //
T02D2256:188a-28: gcig shos skye 'gros rtogs pa ltar //
T02D2256:188a-29: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi rtogs so //
T02D2256:188a-31: de nyid sangs rgyas kho nas shes //
T02D2256:188a-33: de'i phyir mi shes pas g-yogs pa rnams kyis de nyid rtogs par mi nus zhes pa'o //
T02D2256:188a-34: mi shes pa de gang yin zhe na /
T02D2256:188a-35: srid pa'i phyag rgyas 'gro ba rnams //
T02D2256:188a-36: ma lus pa ni khol por byas //
T02D2256:188a-37: gnyug ma yi ni rang bzhin ni //
T02D2256:188a-38: sus kyang blangs pa yod ma yin //
T02D2256:188a-40: srid pa'i phyag rgyas 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams dbang du byas pa yin te /
T02D2256:188a-41: srid pa'i phyag rgya ni yan lag can ma ste
T02D2256:188a-42: sems sdig che ba dang rgyu dang ldan pa des
T02D2256:188a-43: 'gro ba rnams khol por byas pas /
T02D2256:188a-44: gal te 'dod na 'dod pa'i srid pas srog gcod
T02D2256:188a-45: pa la sogs pa thams cad byed pa la 'jug
T02D2256:188b-0: ste / 'dod pa'i bde ba des 'gro ba @188b kun smyon pa lta bur byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2256:188b-1: de'i phyir rang bzhin gnyug ma ni yang dag pa'i de nyid do //
T02D2256:188b-2: sus kyang blangs pa med pa ni sus kyang rtog pa med pa'o //
T02D2256:188b-3: gzhan yang nor gyis srid pas sngags dang rgyud la
T02D2256:188b-4: sogs pa bshad pas 'gro ba rnams rmongs par byed
T02D2256:188b-6: rgyud med sngags kyang med pa ste //
T02D2256:188b-7: bsam bya dang ni bsam gtan med //
T02D2256:188b-9: 'di ni gzhung byed pa pos snying rje'i dbang gis gsungs te /
T02D2256:188b-10: rgyud dang sngags tsam pos ni thar pa thob pa ma yin no //
T02D2256:188b-12: kye rmongs pa de kun 'khrul pa'i rgyu //
T02D2256:188b-14: kye blun po rgyud dang sngags de dag ni //
T02D2256:188b-15: srid pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D2256:188b-16: yang na 'khrul pa ni gang gi sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed pa'o //
T02D2256:188b-18: dri ma med pa'i sems la ni //
T02D2256:188b-19: bsam gtan gyis kyang bslang mi bya //
T02D2256:188b-21: dri ma med pa'i sems mi shes pas mi bslad cing ma bcings pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2256:188b-22: ci'i phyir dri ma med ce na /
T02D2256:188b-23: sems zhes bya ba ni gnyis te 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D2256:188b-24: 'jig rten pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can ni sngon du sun phyung zin to //
T02D2256:188b-25: 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D2256:188b-26: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo 'am chos kyi sku'i
T02D2256:188b-28: bdag nyid bde nas gdung ma byed //
T02D2256:188b-30: 'dis ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid du /
T02D2256:188b-31: khams gsum rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D2256:188b-32: de bas na bdag nyid brlag par ma byed cig
T02D2256:188b-33: ces sdug bsngal la mi gnas zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2256:188b-34: to // bde ba'i rang bzhin du gyis shig ces pa'o //
T02D2256:188b-35: de ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D2256:188b-36: za zhing 'thung la zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2256:188b-37: nas mnan nas 'gro ba'i bar gyis ni spros pa
T02D2256:188b-38: dang bcas pa'i spyod pa ston te /
T02D2256:188b-39: ji ltar rgyal po aindra bh'u tis byis pa lta
T02D2256:188b-40: bu za ba dang 'thung ba dang 'dod pa'i yon
T02D2256:188b-41: tan lnga la longs spyod cing gnyis sprod pa'i bde
T02D2256:189a-3: yang thod pa la sogs pa blangs la gtar ma
T02D2256:189a-4: sbyin zhing tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gang zag rnams lha'i
T02D2256:189a-7: skal ba dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams ye shes grub pa ste /
T02D2256:189a-8: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'grub pa'o //
T02D2256:189a-9: rmongs pa'i 'jig rten ni mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa bsten pa ste /
T02D2256:189a-10: de'i mgo bor rdog pas mnan nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o //
T02D2256:189a-11: 'dis ni phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa ste //
T02D2256:189a-12: de'i gdams ngag gang yin zhe na //
T02D2256:189a-13: gang du rlung dang sems mi rgyu //
T02D2256:189a-14: nyi ma zla ba 'jug med pa //
T02D2256:189a-15: de la rmongs pas sems ngal sos //
T02D2256:189a-16: mda' bsnun gyis ni man ngag bstan //
T02D2256:189a-18: gang bla ma'i man ngag gis skye 'gro thams cad
T02D2256:189a-19: kyis de kho na nyid rang gis nyams su myong
T02D2256:189a-21: sems ngal sos pa dang bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:189a-22: de lta bu'i gnas pa de la rlung dang sems
T02D2256:189a-23: mi rgyu zhing de nyid la nyi ma dang zla
T02D2256:189a-25: rnam par rtog pa med pa tsam ni ma yin te /
T02D2256:189a-26: dngos po thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:189a-27: ji ltar byis pa rnams kyis dgongs te bstan pa'i skad mi shes pas /
T02D2256:189a-28: yid dang rlung mnyam par 'gag pa la brten nas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:189a-29: de bas na 'dir 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni 'gag pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2256:189a-30: rlung 'gog pa rab rlabs kyis dgos ba ci yod ces pa'o //
T02D2256:189a-31: ji srid du lus yod par rlung rgyu ste /
T02D2256:189a-32: de srid du rlung 'gags pas 'gogs pa'i snyoms 'jug gam 'ching bar gyur pa ste /
T02D2256:189a-33: de'i phyir bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
T02D2256:189a-34: ma'i bsnun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2256:189a-35: 'on kyang rlung ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2256:189a-36: de nyid bdud rtsi yang yin te yid bde ba'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2256:189a-37: de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba ni 'dod chags dang /
T02D2256:189b-1: de dag gi rtag pa ma yin pa'i lhan cig skyes pa gang yin pa de blang bar bya'o //
T02D2256:189b-2: de lta bu'i gdams pa ni thob nas /
T02D2256:189b-3: gnyis su mi bya gcig tu 'ang min //
T02D2256:189b-5: rigs la bye brag med par ni //
T02D2256:189b-6: khams gsum ma lus 'di thams cad //
T02D2256:189b-8: de de thog ma bar mtha' med //
T02D2256:189b-9: srid min mya ngan 'das pa min //
T02D2256:189b-10: bde ba chen po mchog 'di la //
T02D2256:189b-11: bdag dang gzhan du yod ma yin //
T02D2256:189b-12: mdun dang rgyab dang phyogs bcu ru //
T02D2256:189b-13: gang gang mthong ba de de nyid //
T02D2256:189b-14: de ring da ltar 'khrul pa chad //
T02D2256:189b-15: da ni su la'ang dri mi bya //
T02D2256:189b-16: dbang gang du nub gyur tsam na //
T02D2256:189b-17: rang gi ngo bo nyams par gyur //
T02D2256:189b-18: grogs dag de ni lhan cig skyes //
T02D2256:189b-19: bla ma'i zhal nas gsal bar dris //
T02D2256:189b-20: zhes bya ba'i bar mi go sla'o //
T02D2256:189b-21: 'on kyang thams cad bla ma'i gdams ngag gis khyab pa'o //
T02D2256:189b-22: de'i phyir de thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du gyis shig ces pa'o //
T02D2256:189b-23: kha cig tu gal te 'khrul pa yod na de'i tshe /
T02D2256:189b-24: bla ma'i zhabs kyi gan du gsal por dri bar gyis shig dang /
T02D2256:189b-26: des na de'i tshe bla ma'i bka' lung gis gdams ngag bsten pa'i tshul gsungs te /
T02D2256:189b-27: yid ni gang shi rlung gar dengs //
T02D2256:189b-29: gang gi phyir yid shi ba dang rlung yang zad cing dengs bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:189b-30: de gnyis 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
T02D2256:189b-32: 'di ni bde chen mchog yin te //
T02D2256:189b-36: mchog gi bde ba chen po gang gis ma thob pa de yang spangs la ste /
T02D2256:189b-37: yang dag pa'i bla ma'i gdams ngag med pas brjod
T02D2256:189b-38: bya dang rjod byed kyi 'brel pa ston pa'i sgo
T02D2256:189b-39: nas cung zad kyang mi rnyed do zhes pa'o //
T02D2256:189b-40: gar yang mi 'gro'o zhes pa ni gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste /
T02D2256:189b-41: ngag gi spyod yul ma yin zhes dgongs so //
T02D2256:190a-2: blo yi spyod yul ma yin ngag gi spyod yul dag las 'das //
T02D2256:190a-3: bla mas bstan pa'i dngos po brjod cing 'jug pa dag la ring //
T02D2256:190a-4: de yang rigs kyi snying rje ngag sogs yon tan dri med pa'i //
T02D2256:190a-5: dad ldan sems kyi go 'phang la ni rang nyid kyi ni 'char //
T02D2256:190a-7: kye ho rang gi 'di la ma 'khrul cig / dngos po dngos po med pa ni //
T02D2256:190a-10: rang rig pa ste thog ma med pa'i dus nas
T02D2256:190a-11: brtags pa'i bde ba zhes grogs po dag rtog par
T02D2256:190a-12: ma byed cig / gal te byed na rmongs par
T02D2256:190a-14: de'i phyir dngos po ste gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D2256:190a-15: bde 'gro'i rnam par rtog pa ste //
T02D2256:190a-16: kye rmongs pa de thams cad 'ching ba yin no //
T02D2256:190a-17: gser gyi sgrog dang lcags kyi srog la 'ching bar bye brag med de /
T02D2256:190a-18: de'i phyir 'di thams cad bor bar bya'o //
T02D2256:190a-19: de ltar dam par yang rtog pa med pa ste /
T02D2256:190a-21: dge ba dang ni mi dge yang //
T02D2256:190a-22: rtog pa nyid du bye brag med//
T02D2256:190a-23: mes ni sreg par byed pa la //
T02D2256:190a-24: bud shing khyad kyi bye brag med //
T02D2256:190a-25: reg bzhin bas na de sreg ste //
T02D2256:190a-28: kye ho rnal 'byor gnyug ma yi //
T02D2256:190a-29: yid la nan tan gyis la ltos //
T02D2256:190a-30: ji lar chu la chu 'dres bzhin //
T02D2256:190a-32: kye rnal 'byor pa gcig tu sdod dang /
T02D2256:190a-33: gnyug ma'i yid dngos po dang /
T02D2256:190a-34: dngos po med pa spangs pa'am /
T02D2256:190a-35: 'od gsal gyi ngo bo nyid la ltos shig ces pa'o //
T02D2256:190a-36: gcig tu sdod pa'i rnal 'byor ni sems kyi 'jug
T02D2256:190a-37: pa dmigs pa la sems rtse gcig pa'am shes pa
T02D2256:190a-38: dang shes bya'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2256:190a-39: de yang gang chu la chu bzhag pa bzhin du
T02D2256:190a-40: bzhag ste 'dres pa de lta bur gyur na rnal
T02D2256:190a-42: brdzun pa'i bsam gtan dag gis ni //
T02D2256:190a-43: thar pa nyid ni ji ltar rnyed //
T02D2256:190b-0: sgyu 'phrul gyi ni dra ba @190b dag / ji ltar pang du blang bar bya //
T02D2256:190b-2: brdzun pa'i skra shad ni rab rib can gyi lta
T02D2256:190b-3: bur thar pa rtog par ga la 'gyur te mi
T02D2256:190b-4: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' thub des shin tu rnyed par dka'o //
T02D2256:190b-6: sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni khams gsum ma lus pa'o //
T02D2256:190b-7: ji ltar pang du blang bar bya ba ni /
T02D2256:190b-8: de lta bus rtogs par mi nus zhes pa'o //
T02D2256:190b-10: bla ma mchog gis gsungs pa rnams //
T02D2256:190b-11: thams cad la ni yid chos kyis //
T02D2256:190b-12: mda' bsnun nga yi ngag gis bstan //
T02D2256:190b-14: gal te re zhig bla ma'i bka' bden par yid ches pa de'i tshe /
T02D2256:190b-15: bla ma mtsho skyes rdo rje mchog gi zhabs kyi
T02D2256:190b-16: gsung gis das 'dir do ha ko sha'i 'grel pa
T02D2256:190b-17: byas so // gdod nas dag pa'i nam mkha' la //
T02D2256:190b-19: de ltar bla ma'i gdams ngag gis yid ches par
T02D2256:190b-20: byas na srid pa thams cad kyi ngal ba gang
T02D2256:190b-21: yin pa de thams cad dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:190b-23: bltas shing bltas shing mthong ba dga' //
T02D2256:190b-25: ji ltar thag ring la smig rgyu la chur mthong
T02D2256:190b-26: ba yang dang yang du bltas bas mthar 'gags par
T02D2256:190b-27: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du 'dir yang dpyad bzhin
T02D2256:190b-28: pas thams cad khyad par can gyi chos sku'i rang
T02D2256:190b-29: 'gyur ro // bzhin 'gyur te / gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D2256:190b-31: bla ma dam pa'i gdams dag mngon du byas pa'i rgyun gyi ni /
T02D2256:190b-32: de yang rnam par rtog pa'i sgom pa ni smig rgyu'i chu bzhin no //
T02D2256:190b-33: gal te de nyid kyis sangs rgyas 'grub po zhes zer na /
T02D2256:190b-34: de'i tshe sangs rgyas rten 'brel du 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:190b-35: mun pa med pa'i snang ba bzhin no //
T02D2256:190b-36: grib ma med pa dang nyi 'od bzhin du khyad
T02D2256:190b-37: par can gyi sprul pa'i sku 'di las 'byung ngo
T02D2256:190b-38: // yi dags 'gog pa las ni khyad par can gyi chos sku'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:190b-39: de yang thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin no zhes dgongs te /
T02D2256:190b-40: yang de la yid shi zhing 'gags pa zhes ni mi bya'o //
T02D2256:191a-2: 'di lta bu yi nam mkha' la //
T02D2256:191a-3: gang zhig gi ni dus su 'gog / gnyug ma'i yid kyi skyon gyis ni //
T02D2256:191a-4: byis pa rnams kyis ma go'o //
T02D2256:191a-6: de lta bu'i nyon mongs pa dus su 'gog pa
T02D2256:191a-7: ni ma skyes pa'i dus te thams cad kyis 'jig
T02D2256:191a-9: de'i tshe nges par sred pa la mngon par zhen pa'i skyon gyis byis pa dang /
T02D2256:191a-10: mu stegs ba rnams bslus te ma rig pa'o //
T02D2256:191a-12: nga rgyal gyi ni skyon gyis ni //
T02D2256:191a-13: de nyid mtshon par mi nus so //
T02D2256:191a-15: log pa'i ye shes pa'i nga rgyal gyis de nyid mtshon bar mi nus so //
T02D2256:191a-16: theg pa ma lus sun 'byin cing //
T02D2256:191a-18: de skyon dang ldan pas ma lus pa'i theg pa sun 'byin te /
T02D2256:191a-19: ma rungs pa'i skyes bu bzhin no //
T02D2256:191a-20: 'jig rten pa kun theg pas rmongs //
T02D2256:191a-22: 'jig rten pa kun rang rang gi theg pa ste
T02D2256:191a-23: mu stegs pa kun rang rang gi theg pa rnams
T02D2256:191a-24: rmongs pa'o // gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa //
T02D2256:191a-25: de ni sus kyang ma rtogs so //
T02D2256:191a-26: zhes gzhung byed pa'i mkhan po ha las pa'o //
T02D2256:191a-27: yang sems kyi rtsa ba mtshon te //
T02D2256:191a-28: lhan cig skyes pa de nyid gsum //
T02D2256:191a-29: de dang der skyes de ru nub //
T02D2256:191a-30: de ni gsal por gnas pa'o //
T02D2256:191a-32: 'dir ni gdams ngag gsal por ston te /
T02D2256:191a-33: sems kyi ni gdams ngag sems pa ste gcig /
T02D2256:191a-34: de bzhin du rtsa ba mi mngon pa ni bla
T02D2256:191a-35: ma'i gsung gis bstan pa'i don mtshon byed de gnyis
T02D2256:191a-36: / lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid mtshon byed kyis ma mtshon pa dang /
T02D2256:191a-37: de nyid rnam pa gsum gyis de ltar mtshon bya
T02D2256:191a-38: dang mtshon pa po gsum brdzun zhing log pa ste
T02D2256:191a-39: / de ltar yin na lhan cig skyes pa ni
T02D2256:191a-40: rjod byed kyi 'brel ba'i sgo nas mi rnyed de
T02D2256:191a-41: / / brjod bya rjod byed 'brel pa ste //
T02D2256:191a-42: gsum gyis lhan cig skyes mi rnyed //
T02D2256:191a-43: bsten pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2256:191b-0: bcom ldan @191b 'das kyis cung zad gsungs //
T02D2256:191b-1: glegs bam mthong ba tsam gyis ni //
T02D2256:191b-2: sems can rnams kyis mi rtogs so //
T02D2256:191b-3: gang dang gang gis dngos mthong ba //
T02D2256:191b-4: rang bzhin 'khrul cing rtog pa ste //
T02D2256:191b-5: da dang de yi dngos mi mthong //
T02D2256:191b-6: 'khrul med bla ma'i brgyud pas so //
T02D2256:191b-8: gal te bzung nas kyang de'i tshe thams cad sems las byung ba'i ngo bor 'gyur te /
T02D2256:191b-9: des ni gdams ngag gi brgyud pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:191b-10: de lta bu'i gnas la rnal 'byor ba dpa' bo 'ga' tsam grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2256:191b-11: de'i phyir 'di lta bus gnas par bya'o //
T02D2256:191b-12: de la chos thams cad 'jug par byed pa ni don dam pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2256:191b-13: de nyid bde ba chen po gcig tu rgyal gyur cing //
T02D2256:191b-14: 'gro ba rnams la rtag 'char rgyu rkyen bral 'gyur ba //
T02D2256:191b-15: gang zhig gis ni de nyid brjod pa'i dus dag na //
T02D2256:191b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa dag kyang tshig gis phongs //
T02D2256:191b-18: rtsa ba bral ba'i de nyid ni //

T02D2256:199b-33: tha mal pa'i yul 'ba' zhig sten par byed pa

T02D2256:203a-0: @203a * // rnal 'byor ma ni nga yis mthong //

T02D2256:203a-14: khyim bdag sems dbang du gyur pa'i phyir sems ni lus kyi rnam pa ste /

T02D2256:205b-11: yul dang dbang po lta bur chu yis blangs nas gsod pa lta bur snang yang mi 'chi ste /
T02D2256:205b-12: glang po dang rtse mkhas pas so //
T02D2256:205b-13: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis phyir byung nas gnas su 'gro zhes bya'o //
T02D2256:205b-14: de ltar bza' bya ma yin pa de mi rigs so zhes dgongs so //
T02D2256:205b-16: gang zhig srid de mya ngan 'das pa'o //
T02D2256:205b-17: de la dbye ba ma sems shig / rang bzhin gcig pas rnam par spangs //
T02D2256:205b-18: dri med de ni nga yis rtogs //
T02D2256:205b-20: ji ltar 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas //
T02D2256:205b-21: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa las //
T02D2256:205b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de bzhin du /
T02D2256:205b-24: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su
T02D2256:205b-25: med pa de ni dbyer med pa'i zung du 'jug
T02D2256:205b-26: pa zhes bya'o // de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2256:205b-28: gang na 'dug kyang sems la ltos //
T02D2256:205b-29: ma lus rgyun du byang chub gnas //
T02D2256:205b-30: srid gang mya ngan 'das gang yin //
T02D2256:205b-32: khyim dang gnyis ka la yang nges par gnas par mi bya ste /
T02D2256:205b-33: gnas gnyis po la zhen na rnam rtog skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2256:205b-34: 'o na ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D2256:205b-35: gang dang gang za pa dang /
T02D2256:205b-36: 'chags pa dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i dus su
T02D2256:205b-37: de la sems yongs su chags par ma byed cig
T02D2256:205b-38: // brdzun pa'i rnam par rig pa tsam du gyis shig ces bya ba'o //
T02D2256:205b-40: mkhas pas ma lus rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub gnas pa ste /
T02D2256:206a-0: gang cung zad kyang skye ba @206a * //
T02D2256:206a-2: rang byung gi ye shes kyi phyir ro //
T02D2256:206a-5: de nyid ma mthong rtogs par byed //
T02D2256:206a-7: de nyid ma mthong rtogs par byed //
T02D2256:206a-9: gnyis ka yod pa ma yin te //
T02D2256:206a-10: 'khor ba yongs su shes ba nyid //
T02D2256:206a-11: mya ngan 'das zhes de la bya //
T02D2256:206a-13: de'i phyir byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnyis
T02D2256:206a-14: su med pa'i ngo bo mchog yin par grub pa'o
T02D2256:206a-16: byang chub khyim dang nags na gnas //
T02D2256:206a-17: 'di yi dbye ba shes par gyas //
T02D2256:206a-18: dri med sems kyi rang bzhin la //
T02D2256:206a-19: de ni rtog pa med par bya //
T02D2256:206a-21: gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub ni
T02D2256:206a-22: khyim dang nags na med pa de lta bu'i dbye
T02D2256:206a-23: ba dgongs pa'i tshig gis shes par bya'o //
T02D2256:206a-24: khyim ni rang gi lus so //
T02D2256:206a-25: nags ni bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
T02D2256:206a-26: de la byang chub med do //
T02D2256:206a-28: gang gis de ni yongs sems pa //
T02D2256:206a-29: dbye bas 'ching dang bral bar bya //
T02D2256:206a-30: des ni bdag nyid grol pa'o //
T02D2256:206a-32: gang gis 'di ni bdag 'di na gzhan zhes gsungs
T02D2256:206a-33: te bya ba gang des phyin ci log tu yongs
T02D2256:206a-34: su sgom pa de dbye bas 'ching ba med kyang
T02D2256:206a-35: 'on kyang bdag nyid rnam par bcings pa'o //
T02D2256:206a-36: de'i tshe bdag nyid grol yang ma grol zhes bya ste /
T02D2256:206a-37: de'i phyir bdag dang gzhan gyi char mi rtog go zhes dgongs so //
T02D2256:206a-39: bdag dang gzhan du 'khrul ma byed //
T02D2256:206a-40: ma lus rgyun du sangs rgyas yin //
T02D2256:206a-41: d'i nyid dri med go 'phang mchog / sems nyid rang bzhin dag pa'o //
T02D2256:206a-43: sems can gyi rigs rnams dang po nyid nas sangs rgyas yin te /
T02D2256:206a-44: de nyid dang po nyid nas glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pas bsgoms pas ma rtogs te /
T02D2256:206a-45: rang nyid sangs rgyas yin pa ma shes so //
T02D2256:206a-46: de nyid dri ma med pa'i mchog / sems kyi
T02D2256:206a-47: ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi rang bzhin yin te
T02D2256:206a-48: / dngos po thams cad 'dzin pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2256:206a-49: gnyis med sems kyi sdong po mchog / sa gsum ma lus khyab par son //
T02D2256:206b-1: ming ni gzhan la phan pa'o //
T02D2256:206b-3: de ltar mchog gi don bstan nas gzhan la phan pa ston te /
T02D2256:206b-4: rnal 'byor ba'i sems gang gnyis su med pa ni
T02D2256:206b-5: dpag bsam gyi shing bzhin du khams gsum ma lus
T02D2256:206b-6: par khyab par son pa ste /
T02D2256:206b-7: thams cad gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2256:206b-8: de'i snying rje'i me tog gi 'bras bu'i ming ni gzhan la phan pa ste /
T02D2256:206b-9: thams cad kyi thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi byang
T02D2256:206b-10: chub la sogs pa rgyas par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D2256:206b-11: // stod pa'i sdong po me tog skyes //
T02D2256:206b-12: snying rje rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung//
T02D2256:206b-13: lhun grub gzhan gyi 'bras bu ste //
T02D2256:206b-14: bde ba 'di ni sems gzhan min //
T02D2256:206b-16: de ltar stong pa'i 'bras bu snying rje rnam pa
T02D2256:206b-17: sna tshogs kyis mi 'dod bzhin du yang bsam pa
T02D2256:206b-18: sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D2256:206b-19: // 'on kyang yongs su rdzogs pa'i snying rje ston pa ni /
T02D2256:206b-20: stong pa'i sdong po snying rje min //
T02D2256:206b-21: gang la rtsa ba lo 'dab med //
T02D2256:206b-22: de la dmigs byed gang yin pa //
T02D2256:206b-23: de ni lhung nas yal ga chag / ces gsungs te /
T02D2256:206b-24: stong pa'i sdong po snying rje min pa ni stong
T02D2256:206b-25: pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i phyir 'dir dmigs
T02D2256:206b-26: pa med pa'i snying rje la snying rje min pa
T02D2256:206b-27: zhes bya'o // stong pa nyid kyi sdong po de la rtsa ba dang lo 'dab med do //
T02D2256:206b-28: sgom pa dang sgom pa po dang /
T02D2256:206b-29: bsgom bya gdod ma nas med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2256:206b-30: de la dmigs bar byed pa gang yin pa de
T02D2256:206b-31: ni lhung nas yal ga chag pa ni khams gsum
T02D2256:206b-32: gcig ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas so //
T02D2256:206b-34: sa bon gcig la sdong po gnyis //
T02D2256:206b-35: ltos pa med pas me tog gcig /'dir ni dbyer med gang mthong ste //
T02D2256:206b-36: srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol //
T02D2256:206b-38: sa bon gcig la sdong po dang yal ga'i bye brag gnyis skye ste /
T02D2256:206b-39: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
T02D2256:206b-40: de yang 'bras bu las tha mi dad do //
T02D2256:206b-41: rgyu de lta bu las 'bras bu'o zhes gsungs pa'i
T02D2256:206b-42: phyir sangs rgyas dang 'khor ba dbyer med par mthong
T02D2256:206b-43: ba de ni thar par 'gyur te /
T02D2256:206b-44: gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2256:207a-2: de ni re ba med song nas //
T02D2256:207a-3: kham por dum bu blangs nas ni //
T02D2256:207a-4: kye ho rang khyim bor la song //
T02D2256:207a-6: gong du bstan ba'i don mtha' dag 'khor ba'i longs
T02D2256:207a-7: spyod la chags pa med pa de'i tshe rtogs par
T02D2256:207a-8: 'gyur ro // longs spyod la chags pa dang bu
T02D2256:207a-9: dang tsha bo la sogs pa yang dag par rgyas
T02D2256:207a-10: pa ni sbrul gyi dug dang 'dra bar gnod pa
T02D2256:207a-12: de'i phyir snying rje dang ldan pas 'dod pa can slong ba'i mi 'ongs pa'i tshe /
T02D2256:207a-13: bdag nyid srid pa'i dbang gis cung zad kyang mi
T02D2256:207a-14: ster na nga la dngos grub mi 'byung ngo zhes
T02D2256:207a-15: bsams nas rang gi khyim nas thon te phyir bor
T02D2256:207a-16: ba'i kham por blangs nas longs spyod la chags par
T02D2256:207a-17: mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2256:207a-19: gzhan la phan pa ma byas shing //
T02D2256:207a-20: 'dod pa la ni mi ster ba //
T02D2256:207a-22: de bas ring por byas na rung //
T02D2256:207a-24: gzhan la phan pa ma nus na khyim dang longs spyod kyi dgos pa ci yod /
T02D2256:207a-25: gal te gser la sogs pa'i nor yod pa sbyin
T02D2256:207a-26: par mi gtong na 'khor bar gnas pa la nor
T02D2256:207a-28: de'i tshe rang nyid bor ba byas na rung gi
T02D2256:207a-29: khyim nas 'thon la lus dang srog la mi lta
T02D2256:207a-30: bar gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2256:207a-31: byis pa'o skye bo rnams kyi dor do ha mdzod kyi t'i ka dka' ba'i don 'grel byas pa'o //
T02D2256:207a-32: rang gis go bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2256:207a-34: ming ni bdag nyid go byed pa //
T02D2256:207a-35: bla ma brgyud ri ma gsal byed pa'o //
T02D2256:207a-36: gang tshe gzhan gyis bltas nas kyang //
T02D2256:207a-37: de tshe de la phan gyur na //
T02D2256:207a-38: de na sems can don gyur yin //
T02D2256:207a-39: de lta min na bzod par zhu //
T02D2256:207a-40: rang gi don dang gzhan don du //
T02D2256:207a-41: bdag gis 'di byas bsod nams kyis //
T02D2256:207a-42: de yis 'jig rten thams cad kun //
T02D2256:207a-43: rang byung ye shes thob par shog / do ha
T02D2256:207a-44: mdzod kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis
T02D2256:207a-45: su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2256:207a-47: // rgya gar lho phyogs yul ko sa lar sku 'khrungs
T02D2256:207a-48: pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po shr'i bee ro tsa
